content: #racism in #healthcare is pervasive & insidious...but imagine, if there were no video evidence, whether it would be revealed. I invite us all to read this article; ponder when & where we have tolerated/been part of the problem; and commit to frank #antiracism in the future.

name: timberwraith
content: I just want to remind people that when the chattering class and politicians in the US say "working class" they nearly always mean "white working class" to the exclusion of everyone else.The same was true for "middle class" in the 1990s.Same racist bullshit, different decade.
